work.name: KHQR Logo
work.description: KHQR is a QR Code where any banks can scan to pay via Cambodian Mobile Banking Apps

more.content: Taking the letter KHQR and specific the symbolism of QR by creating a logofication illustration QR. As you can see in the picture below.

The purpose of KHQR is to create a centralized QRCode where any mobile banking apps in Cambodia can scan and pay with it. So KHQR is a must to have a QR stand, this QR stand is created and measured for the best scanning length just for the COVID-19 prevention as well.
A QR Stand for any merchants that registered under any banks.

work.name: Open Banking
work.description: Managing documents for other banks to develop is really hard, sometimes, the document is lacking in information or is not updated. Open Banking is a platform where everyone can see the document and doing sandbox on it as well

more.content: Easy access and usage, Open Banking by NBC
User interface is simply go for monotone color and aims for the best document practice.
How Open Banking platform is user simplification?
We simplified the interface for the best experience such as fixed navbar with bright and clear instruction to follow which is a big improvement for both beauty and how easy the platform to use.

work.name: Open Banking Logo/Branding
work.description: A logo of Open Banking, a document platform for a bank to access the document for developing or integrate the system that National Bank of Cambodia created.

more.content: By crafting a logo in which the documentation platform. I simply get inspired by paper folding while I am sitting at my desk thinking how paper can be used. Then the paper is folded and turned into letter B which gave me an inspiration about Banking and Paper.

With the letter O as the base measurement (Letter O for Open banking), the logo turns into a long typed with symbol logo. The font and colors in which we used is simply the branding guideline from National Bank of Cambodia. Dark red color and Nunito sans font.
White version of the logo that mostly be used for the platform

work.name: Pomooodoro UI + Branding
work.description: Pomooodoro is a platform used for boosting productivity, where you can work for 20 minutes and rest 5 minutes for 3 loops you can rest for 25 minutes.

more.content: A branding where using the circle as the clock and it sliced as the time go on and on with pink and red color combined which means high positive productivity.
The straight forward User Interface and Experience
White version of the logo that mostly be used for the platform
